plot: Nick devises a plan that will take Capt. Renard out of his element; Adalind and Monroe attempt to keep the plan on track; Eve and Rosalee race to get the spell ready in time.

In order to stop the rise of Capt. Renard (Sasha Roiz), Nick (David Giuntoli) devises a plan that will take him out of his element. Adalind (Claire Coffee) and Monroe (Silas Weir Mitchell) do everything in their power to keep the plan on track. Meanwhile, Eve (Bitsie Tulloch) and Rosalee (Bree Turner) race against time to get the spell ready before it is too late.

Nick is under siege but takes the initiative, magically transforming into Renard, to announce on live TV 'he' is no longer transferring to politics and praise Nick's 'undercover team'. Monroe's team panics as it seems the spell may be irreversible on a Grimm, but after a deal is struck with Renard, whose cahoots are further culled, it works, yet the captain faces a surprise opponent.—KGF Vissers
